item.title: Machine Learning Glossary
item.description: Glossary of terms from Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing, and Statistics.

item.title: Default Arguments in Python
item.description: Pythonâ€™s handling of default argument values is one of the few things that tends to create mistakes unknowingly (only once though). This horror story is from my personal experience. It took me an hour to debug my silly mistake of using mutable value as default argument in function. Its really difficult to find this type bugs in thousands of lines of code. Using Mutable Value as function argument def foo(numbers=[]): numbers.
